alert.note: Alert for Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 08 at 11:47PM HST until March 09 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR LOWER ELEVATIONS OF THE BIG ISLAND UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 6 PM HST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FOR THE HALEAKALA SUMMIT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... .Strong and gusty winds will continue for lower elevations across the Big Island tonight then diminish Thursday. Dangerously strong winds will affect the higher elevations on the Big Island and Haleakala. The winds will be particularly long lasting over the Big Island summits. ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 55 to 65 mph with higher gusts. * WHERE...Haleakala Summit. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
